::Zardus::

Zardus patiently waits for the scene to wrap up, gathering some information about the bots from their whispers. Orchestra was Composer's brother...

Interesting possibilities presented themselves in Zardus's mind, and he thinks them all over.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Abyssian Badass" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra/Composer::
> 
> This moment was too tense for the brothers and they couldn't listen to
> Zardus.
> 
> "Brother......" Orchestra whispered.
> 
> "So long....." Composer whispered.
> 
> They continued to stare at each other in disbelief, then they spontaneously
> broke into a "oh-my-god-it's-been-so-long-I-though-I'd-never-see-you" hug...
